means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 帕罗持 Peter的昵称
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 帕罗持住所名称，来源于河流名Parret,语源不详

sentence.Network_en: Ken passed the books to Sergeant Parrott.
sentence.Network_cn: 肯把那些书递给帕罗特警官。

sentence.Network_en: Sergeant Parrott normally spoke with an upper-crust accent.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕罗特军士说话通常带着上流社会的腔调。

auth_sentence.content: Parrott's prediction: He has an outstanding chance.
